recipe.title: Chicken & Broccoli Alfredo–Stuffed Shells Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups ; broccoli florets, cooked, cut into small florets ; (500 g)
1 jar ; alfredo sauce, 1/4 cup/57 grams set aside
1 cup ; mozzarella cheese, shredded and divided ; (110 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, mix chicken, broccoli, alfredo sauce, and ½ cup/55 grams of mozzarella.
Stuff mixture into the jumbo shells, and place in rows in a greased 9x13 inch/23x33 cm glass baking dish.
Spread on ¼ cup/57 grams alfredo sauce and sprinkle on remaining ½ cup/55 grams of mozzarella.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, mix chicken, broccoli, alfredo sauce, and ½ cup/55 grams of mozzarella.
Stuff mixture into the jumbo shells, and place in rows in a greased 9x13 inch/23x33 cm glass baking dish.
Spread on ¼ cup/57 grams alfredo sauce and sprinkle on remaining ½ cup/55 grams of mozzarella.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
